trans-unit.source: Invoke MapReduce Program from Azure Data Factory
trans-unit.target: Invoke MapReduce Program from Azure Data Factory

trans-unit.source: Learn how to process data by running MapReduce programs on an Azure HDInsight cluster from an Azure data factory.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to process data by running MapReduce programs on an Azure HDInsight cluster from an Azure data factory.

trans-unit.source: Invoke MapReduce Programs from Data Factory
trans-unit.target: Invoke MapReduce Programs from Data Factory

trans-unit.source: This article describes how to invoke a MapReduce program from an Azure Data Factory pipeline by using the HDInsight MapReduce Activity.
trans-unit.target: This article describes how to invoke a MapReduce program from an Azure Data Factory pipeline by using the HDInsight MapReduce Activity.

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: Introduction

trans-unit.source: A pipeline in an Azure data factory processes data in linked storage services by using linked compute services.
trans-unit.target: A pipeline in an Azure data factory processes data in linked storage services by using linked compute services.

trans-unit.source: It contains a sequence of activities where each activity performs a specific processing operation.
trans-unit.target: It contains a sequence of activities where each activity performs a specific processing operation.

trans-unit.source: This article describes using the MapReduce transformation of the HDInsight Activity.
trans-unit.target: This article describes using the MapReduce transformation of the HDInsight Activity.

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>Pig</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>Hive</linkText><title></title></link> article for details about running Pig/Hive scripts on an HDInsight cluster from an Azure data factory pipeline by using Pig/Hive transformations of the HDInsight Activity.
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>Pig</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>Hive</linkText><title></title></link> article for details about running Pig/Hive scripts on an HDInsight cluster from an Azure data factory pipeline by using Pig/Hive transformations of the HDInsight Activity.

trans-unit.source: JSON for HDInsight Activity using MapReduce transformation
trans-unit.target: JSON for HDInsight Activity using MapReduce transformation

trans-unit.source: In the JSON definition for the HDInsight Activity:
trans-unit.target: In the JSON definition for the HDInsight Activity:

trans-unit.source: Set the type of the activity to HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Set the type of the activity to HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Specify the name of the class for className property.
trans-unit.target: Specify the name of the class for className property.

trans-unit.source: Specify the path to the JAR file including the file name for jarFilePath property.
trans-unit.target: Specify the path to the JAR file including the file name for jarFilePath property.

trans-unit.source: Specify the linked service that refers to the Azure Blob Storage that contains the JAR file for jarLinkedService property.
trans-unit.target: Specify the linked service that refers to the Azure Blob Storage that contains the JAR file for jarLinkedService property.

trans-unit.source: Specify any arguments for the MapReduce program in the arguments section.
trans-unit.target: Specify any arguments for the MapReduce program in the arguments section.

trans-unit.source: You can use the MapReduce transformation to run any MapReduce jar file on an HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: You can use the MapReduce transformation to run any MapReduce jar file on an HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: In the following sample JSON definition of a pipeline, the HDInsight Activity is configured to run a Mahout JAR file.
trans-unit.target: In the following sample JSON definition of a pipeline, the HDInsight Activity is configured to run a Mahout JAR file.

trans-unit.source: Sample
trans-unit.target: Sample

trans-unit.source: You can download a sample for using the HDInsight Activity with MapReduce Transformation from: <link><linkText>Data Factory Samples on GitHub</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: You can download a sample for using the HDInsight Activity with MapReduce Transformation from: <link><linkText>Data Factory Samples on GitHub</linkText><title></title></link>.
